page.title: 20A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: Usually I get woken at 6 o'clock when Dad goes to work (he works with computers.)I get up at 7.30 and feed the fish,rabbit and guinea pigs.After breakfast (usually bread and jam or cereal)I wash and make my bed.I have a lift to school at 8.45. Mrs Lusby takes register, then, after assembly, we have Maths, English, History, Geography, Science etc. First play is at 10.35, lunch 12.10-1.10 (I have sandwiches), after-noon break 2.15 -2.20,and we go home at 3.20p.m. I feed the pets again,then usually I sit glued to the television till Dad gets back, when we have tea.Then I go to guides, craft club or youth club, or ride my bike on the common.I go to bed at 8.00 on school days or 9.00 at the week-end. I usually read in bed. Louisa Welch.
